headline.main: WEYGAND OUSTER EXPECTED IN DEAL; Move in Vichy Submission to Nazis Is Indicated -- Hitler's Envoy Talks to Laval WEYGAND OUSTER EXPECTED IN DEAL

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Nov. 16 -- A "collaboration" crisis in Franco-German relations of particularly serious proportions has just opened in Vichy, according to information circulating here among foreign neutral diplomats, who are watching the situation very closely tonight.
abstract: Berne sources rept collaboration crisis; moves to be taken to break deadlock over acceptance of German demands; negotiations outcome seen to depend on position of Weygand; O Abetz leaves for Paris after seeing Laval and Petain; some Vichy depts transfer officials to Paris
